Sinopsis 'Ford v Ferrari', Kisah Nyata Dunia Balap
07 Nov 2019, 10:16 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Film 'Ford v Ferrari' bercerita tentang manufaktur Ford mengalahkan Ferrari dalam 24 Hours of Le Mans. Berikut sinopsisnya. (dok. Chernin Entertainment/Twentieth Century Fox)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Kurang dari dua pekan lagi, film Ford v Ferrari akan rilis di bioskop. Kisah film itu diangkat dari kisah nyata dunia balap, lebih tepatnya momen 24 Hours of Le Mans. Berikut sinopsisnya.Secara garis besar, film ini bercerita tentang manufaktur Ford mengalahkan Ferrari dalam 24 Hours of Le Mans. Mereka meminta modifikator Carrol Shelby (Matt Damon) untuk mewujudkan itu.Shelby, yang kini dikenal sebagai perancang Shelby Mustang buat Ford, tidak mudah untuk melakukan itu. Butuh dana besar dan pembalap yang andal.Saat itulah Shelby merekrut Ken Miles (Christian Bale). Perekrutan itu tidak mudah karena awalnya Miles menolak, kemudian Ford menyatakan kepada Shelby bahwa ia ragu dengan kemampuan Miles.Dalam cuplikan trailer, terlihat Miles mulai mencoba mobil yang dibangun Shelby setelah resmi bergabung. Melihat dari bentuknya, mobil itu adalah Ford GT40 Mk.II.Penampakan itu sama dengan kejadian di dunia nyata. Ken Miles dan rekan setim dirinya, Denny Hulme, menggunakan GT40 Mk.II dengan mesin V8 7.000 cc untuk balapan di Le Mans.Sayang, Miles hanya berhasil finis di urutan kedua pada Le Mans 1996. Tapi sebagai manufaktur, Ford tetap menang karena pembalap Bruce McLaren yang finis di urutan pertama menggunakan Ford GT40 Mk.II


Secara sinopsis, film 'Ford v Ferrari' bercerita tentang manufaktur Ford mengalahkan Ferrari dalam 24 Hours of Le Mans.: dok. Chernin Entertainment/Twentieth Century Fox

Tahun 1966 menjadi awal kejayaan Ford di balap 24 Hours of Le Mans. Setelah itu, Ford menang Le Mans tiga kali berurutan pada 1967, 1968 dan 1969.Sepanjang film berlangsung akan tersaji mobil-mobil balap legendaris. Bukan sekadar hiburan, film ini juga bisa menjadi sumber pengetahuan singkat sejarah Ford sebagai salah satu manufaktur besar di dunia.Ford v Ferrari disutradarai oleh James Mangold yang sebelumnya The Wolverine (2013) dan Logan (2017). Usai mengetahui sinopsis, Ford v Ferrari akan tayang mulai 15 November.

Synopsis of 'Ford v Ferrari', The True Story of the Racing World
Nov 7 2019, 10:16 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The film 'Ford v Ferrari' tells the story of Ford's manufacturing beat Ferrari in 24 Hours of Le Mans. Here is the synopsis. (doc. Chernin Entertainment / Twentieth Century Fox)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - In less than two weeks, the Ford v Ferrari film will be released in theaters. The story of the film was lifted from the true story of the racing world, more precisely the moment 24 Hours of Le Mans. Following the synopsis. Outline, this film tells the story of Ford's manufacturing beat Ferrari in 24 Hours of Le Mans. They asked the modifier Carrol Shelby (Matt Damon) to make it happen. Shelby, who is now known as the designer Shelby Mustang for Ford, is not easy to do that. It takes big funds and a reliable racer. That's when Shelby recruits Ken Miles (Christian Bale). Recruitment was not easy because initially Miles refused, then Ford told Shelby that he was doubtful of Miles' ability. In the trailer trailer, it was seen that Miles began to try the car that Shelby had built after officially joining. Seeing from its shape, the car is a Ford GT40 Mk.II. The appearance was the same as what happened in the real world. Ken Miles and his teammate, Denny Hulme, used the GT40 Mk.II with a 7,000 cc V8 engine to race at Le Mans.Bear, Miles only managed to finish second in the Le Mans 1996. But as a manufacturer, Ford still won because of the Bruce racer McLaren who finished first uses the Ford GT40 Mk.II


Synopsis, the film 'Ford v Ferrari' tells the story of Ford's manufacturing beat Ferrari in 24 Hours of Le Mans: doc. Chernin Entertainment / Twentieth Century Fox

1966 marked the beginning of Ford's glory in the 24 Hours of Le Mans racing. After that, Ford won Le Mans three times in a row in 1967, 1968 and 1969. Throughout the film the legendary race cars will be presented. Not just entertainment, this film can also be a source of brief knowledge of Ford's history as one of the world's major manufactures. Ford v Ferrari was directed by James Mangold who was previously The Wolverine (2013) and Logan (2017). After knowing the synopsis, the Ford v Ferrari will air starting November 15th.
